arts.ttl: Liverpool Suffer Major Double Injury Blow Ahead of Nottingham Forest Visit
arts.sum: International duty has wreaked havoc on a number of top Premier League clubs.

arts.ttl: Liverpool lose Wirtz and Bradley ahead of Forest test
arts.sum:
Slot rules out Conor Bradley and Florian Wirtz for Nottingham Forest due to muscle injuries, hinting Bradley could be sidelined for up to a month and reshuffles are likely in the lineup.
Alisson should be back.

arts.ttl: Alisson and Alexander return? Predicted Liverpool XI vs. Forest
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Liverpool could line up for Saturday's Premier League clash with Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Could Wood return for Reds? Predicted Forest XI vs. Liverpool
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at how Nottingham Forest could line up for Saturday's Premier League clash with Liverpool.

arts.ttl: Mohamed Salah's record vs. Nottingham Forest
arts.sum: Sports Mole takes an in-depth look at Mohamed Salah's record for Liverpool against Nottingham Forest.

arts.ttl: Premier League reschedules January fixtures for TV picks and UEFA clashes
arts.sum: Key January and February fixtures shift as Sky Sports and TNT Sports lock in broadcast slots, with Forest and Villa clashes moved due to European ties, per Premier League release.
